document.full_text: a new study in the american journal of public health, estimates that nearly two million women have been raped in the democratic republic of congo, with a woman victimized nearly every minute.
document.title: congo study sets estimate for rapes much higher
lines_and_colors: a new study in the american journal of public health, estimates that nearly two million women have been raped in the democratic republic of congo, with a woman victimized nearly every minute.
